input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Microsoft Surface Pro 7 Screen Flickering

Dear Tech Online Store Customer Support,

I am writing to report a persistent screen flickering issue with my new Microsoft Surface Pro 7. This problem is severely affecting my ability to perform high-priority tasks efficiently, and it occurs frequently enough to be a major concern You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. I kindly request your guidance on how to resolve this issue or any available support for a potential replacement.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Best regards,

<name>

<email> My name is Carlos Mendoza.
